EmailTemplate.subject: NCS - how to sign {!Contact.FirstName} up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
Completing {!Contact.FirstName}'s NCS application
Dear {!IF(Contact.Parent_Name__c <>"",""& ( Contact.Parent_Name__c ) &"","Parent or Guardian")},
When we visited {!Contact.School__c}, {!Contact.Name} told us they were interested in NCS. We’ll be in touch to tell you more about NCS soon but if you’re eager to get {!Contact.FirstName} signed up now, here’s how to apply online:
You can click here to log in online and use your unique login details below.
Your NCS ID: {!Contact.NCS_ID__c} Your young person password: {!Contact.Login_PIN__c}
Please note that these login details should only be used by the parent or guardian to complete the application. The young person has separate login details because, whilst they can enter initial details, they cannot complete most of the application.
The NCS Team - The Challenge
For more info, click on the link below: http://www.ncsthechallenge.org/programme/
Or, Sign Up Now! https://bookings.ncsthechallenge.org/
E: contact@ncsthechallenge.org T: 0203 542 2400 www.NCSTheChallenge.org
